rows.label: qev016001_MSG0001
rows.name: It's [ST:playername ], right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0011
rows.name: Acknowledge with a small nod.

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0020
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask who wants to know.

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0002
rows.name: Oh, good. I've been looking for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Not letting your guard down, eh?
I'm impressed, rookie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0004
rows.name: The name's Kirsty. With a K.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0005
rows.name: I'm the operations manager for FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0006
rows.name:
Nagi requested that I brief you on the whole 
FrontierNav "deal." Sound good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0030
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that you already know all about it.

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0040
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0041
rows.name: Hear Kirsty out.

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0007
rows.name:
Oh, really? All that knowledge is swimming around in
your noggin just because you helped Colonel Elma
install one little data probe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0008
rows.name: Sorry, rookie—there's more to the network than that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0009
rows.name:
Excellent. I like your curiosity. Always remember that
FrontierNav connects us to the land—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0010
rows.name:
and like the rest of Mira, it takes dedication and
curiosity to really understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0012
rows.name:
So then! First lesson—there are several different types of
data probes that can be installed at FrontierNav probe-
placement sites.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's vital that you keep the desired application in mind,
because each type of probe yields different effects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0014
rows.name:
What's more, placing the exact same type and grade
of data probe in neighboring sites will amplify the
effects of each probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0015
rows.name:
Now, I could stand here and make you listen to a long,
drawn-out explanation, but I think it's better if you just
try out each one for yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0016
rows.name:
Remember the data probe you installed out on the
East Gate Plain?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that you remember.

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0061
rows.name: Admit to Kirsty that you've forgotten where that was.

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0017
rows.name: Good. I can see why you're on Nagi's short list.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0018
rows.name:
So if you ever need to verify its exact location,
just access the segment map with your comm device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0019
rows.name:
Ha! I like your honesty. In that case, take a look
at the segment map. You can access it with
your comm device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0020
rows.name: The data probe's location should be highlighted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'll point out a pair of placement sites in the plains
past the east gate that you can chain together on
the FrontierNav grid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0022
rows.name: Head there and install a data probe at each site, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0023
rows.name:
But I don't want just any probes installed there—
you'll need to change them to be the same type.
That's how you get the chain amplification effects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0105
rows.name:
You can swap around data probes using your
comm device. Just select the corresponding site
on the FrontierNav map.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0106
rows.name:
If you select Swap Data Probe, you can take
your pick from all the unused probes you've got.
...Er, you DO have unused probes, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0107
rows.name:
Here, take a few mining probes just in case. They're on
me. But don't go spreading tales of my generosity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0108
rows.name:
Your assignment is to travel to the two specified sites
and install data probes there. Then make sure all three
of your installed probes are set as mining probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0109
rows.name: You'll figure it out. It's all much clearer in action.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0024
rows.name:
Have you installed data probes at those two
FrontierNav placement sites yet, rookie?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0025
rows.name:
Once they've both been placed, take a look at the
FrontierNav map on your comm device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0110
rows.name:
All the placement sites you've installed probes at
will be highlighted there. Go ahead and select
one to start with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0111
rows.name:
Then select Swap Data Probe and set one of the
mining probes I gave you earlier, and then just
repeat the process with the other two sites.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0026
rows.name:
The probes are installed aaand...set up as mining
probes. Perfect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0027
rows.name:
You work fast. I'm sure that's part of what Nagi
sees in you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0070
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Kirsty it was a walk in the park.

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0080
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0081
rows.name: Say you were just lucky it worked out.

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0028
rows.name:
All right there, rookie. Don't go getting a big head.
This stuff SHOULD be easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0029
rows.name:
That humility will serve you well. Never lose sight of it.
That said, a little confidence doesn't hurt, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0030
rows.name:
Try setting your comm device's display to
FrontierNav Mode.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0112
rows.name:
You should see three sites circled in red and connected
by link lines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0031
rows.name:
That's a three-site link combo. It boosts the effects of
each of those data probes by 30 percent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0032
rows.name:
If you get that link combo up to five neighboring sites
with the same data probe type set, the effects will be
amplified by 50 percent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0033
rows.name:
And an eight-probe link combo will net you an extra
80 percent. You see where this is going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0034
rows.name:
The more data probes of the same type you install
in neighboring placement sites, the more efficient
FrontierNav—and your related assignments—will be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0035
rows.name:
So? Think you've got the hang of all this chaining-
data-probes jazz?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0090
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0091
rows.name: Nod confidently.

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0100
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0101
rows.name: Stare at Kirsty, utterly confused.

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0036
rows.name: Swift pupils make teaching a pleasure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0038
rows.name:
Look, don't worry. This will come to you, all right?
Take your time with it. Try each type. Experiment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0039
rows.name:
There's no wrong way to install or change a data
probe. It's just about boosting efficiency. Either way,
you can go on exploring worry free.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0040
rows.name: Well then, I'd say that concludes your first assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0041
rows.name:
You can have this research probe by way of reward.
Don't say I never gave you anything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0042
rows.name: I'll teach you about that one next, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0043
rows.name:
We'll start the same way—I'll point you to a new
FrontierNav probe site, and you'll go install a probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0044
rows.name:
Then you'll use your comm device to change its type
to a research probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0045
rows.name:
Then, on top of that, I want you to go find an
unexplored territory known as the Rock Cavern.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0046
rows.name: Good luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0047
rows.name:
Once you've installed a data probe at the placement
site I specified, change its type to a research probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0048
rows.name:
And while you're at it, find the unexplored territory
known as the Rock Cavern and marvel at it with
your own eyes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0049
rows.name:
I'm curious just what sort of place it is.
Hopefully not dangerous, right? Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0050
rows.name: Welcome back, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0051
rows.name: The Rock Cavern looks like a pretty mystical place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0052
rows.name: Folks here in town were all blown away by it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0053
rows.name:
Heh. You seem curious how they could have seen it
without leaving New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0054
rows.name:
Well, by accessing the research probe you installed,
they can view the data it's amassed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0055
rows.name:
For the civilians living here, that's their only way of
learning about the outside world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0056
rows.name:
The probes you're installing aren't just a way to track
down parts of the White Whale's Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0057
rows.name:
Sure, they serve as a source of hope for the future,
but they're also helping people today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0058
rows.name:
I hope that underscores just how important your work
is. Make sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0110
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0111
rows.name: Nod in agreement.

rows.label: qev016001_JNK0120
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev016001_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Kirsty if there are any more perks.

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0059
rows.name: I like the fire in your eyes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0060
rows.name:
Oh, and you'll also receive sightseeing profits if a lot of
people access your research probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0061
rows.name:
New BLADEs need all sorts of equipment,
and a little extra income never hurts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0063
rows.name: Not much slips by you, does it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0064
rows.name:
Well, don't worry—you'll be paid sightseeing profits if
lots of people access your research probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0065
rows.name:
Set enough of them, and you may find yourself raking
in a small fortune.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0092
rows.name:
Discovering unexplored territories like the Rock Cavern
will get lots of people to access your research probes,
so keep an eye out for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0093
rows.name: Hmm, what else am I forgetting... Ah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0097
rows.name:
As you install more probes, miranium mining should
also pick up steam.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0098
rows.name:
You may eventually reach the limit of how much
miranium you can hold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0099
rows.name:
In that case, setting special data probes known as
storage probes can help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0100
rows.name:
They'll raise the limit of how much miranium you can
store.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0101
rows.name:
Let me give you one now as thanks for showing me
that unexplored territory I wouldn't have otherwise seen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0102
rows.name:
Just remember that, like any data probe, simply
carrying around that storage probe won't do
you any good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0104
rows.name:
You'll need to put it into actual use, so access your
comm device at a FrontierNav probe site to change
the installed probe to a storage probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0094
rows.name: ...Whew. That should cover the basics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0095
rows.name:
When more FrontierNav assignments come across my
desk, I'll be sure to send them your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016001_MSG0096
rows.name: Each one spreads our roots into Mira that much farther.[ST:wait ]
